Name: Don Pone
Ingredients: 15 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered crystallised ginger and grated dark chocolate.
RINSE glass with maraschino liqueur (swirl around to coat and discard excess) and set to one side.
Garnish with skewered crystallised ginger and dust with grated dark chocolate.
Review: Maraschino cherry aromas strike you first as you enjoy this cognac-laced, subtly chocolate and ginger after-dinner cocktail.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Pascal Pone at W Hotel, Verbier, Switzerland.
